remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要绘制在 Windows 窗体，应使用一种方法。To draw an on a Windows Form, you should use one of the methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例用于 Windows 窗体。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms. 它是处理程序事件。It is a handler for the event. A对象传递给事件和用于窗体上绘制图像。A object is passed to the event and is used to draw the image on the form. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 从名为 sampimag.jpg 位于同一个文件中创建的映像。Creates an image from a file named SampImag.jpg. 此文件必须位于应用程序可执行文件所在的文件夹。This file must be located in the same folder as the application executable file. - 创建在其中绘制图像的左上角的点。Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 窗体上绘制无比例的图像。Draws the unscaled image on the form. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#55](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#55)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#55](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/CS/form1.cs#55)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples#55](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicGraphicsExamples/VB/form1.vb#55)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

summary.span: Releases all resources used by this .

span.span: Releases all resources used by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法允许使用的资源可以重新分配用于其他目的。Calling the method allows the resources used by this to be reallocated for other purposes. 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的整数值将对应于的总和下, 表中所述。The integer value returned from this method will correspond to a sum of , as described in the following table. |ImageFlag 值ImageFlag value|整数表示形式Integer representation| |---------------------|----------------------------| |`ImageFlagsNone`|00| |`ImageFlagsScalable`|11| |`ImageFlagsHasAlpha`|22| |`ImageFlagsHasTranslucent`|44| |`ImageFlagsPartiallyScalable`|88| |`ImageFlagsColorSpaceRGB`|1616| |`ImageFlagsColorSpaceCMYK`|3232| |`ImageFlagsColorSpaceGRAY`|6464| |`ImageFlagsColorSpaceYCBCR`|128128| |`ImageFlagsColorSpaceYCCK`|256256| |`ImageFlagsHasRealDPI`|40964096| |`ImageFlagsHasRealPixelSize`|81928192| |`ImageFlagsReadOnly`|6553665536| |`ImageFlagsCaching`|131072131072| 例如，如果映像的属性返回 77960，图像很， ， ， ，和。For example, if the property for an image returned 77960, the for the image would be , , , , and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回采取两种样式的多帧图像的相关信息： 多个页面和多个解决方法。This method returns information about multiple-frame images, which come in two styles: multiple page and multiple resolution. 多页映像是包含多个映像的映像。A multiple-page image is an image that contains more than one image. 每页包含单个映像 （或段）。Each page contains a single image (or frame). 连续生成动画的序列，如动态的.gif 文件通常显示这些页 （或映像或帧）。These pages (or images, or frames) are typically displayed in succession to produce an animated sequence, such as an animated .gif file. 多个高分辨率图像是映像的包含多个副本在不同的解决方法的映像。A multiple-resolution image is an image that contains more than one copy of an image at different resolutions. 这是通常由使用 MIP 映射其中显示的图像大小将确定用于绘制图像的分辨率。This is commonly used by MIP mapping where the displayed image size determines the resolution of the image used for drawing. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 可以支持任意数目的页 （或映像，或者帧），以及任意数量的解决方法。 can support an arbitrary number of pages (or images, or frames), as well as an arbitrary number of resolutions. 定义的维度为属性。The defined dimensions are properties of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 托管 GDI + 具有内置编码器和解码器支持以下文件类型：Managed GDI+ has built-in encoders and decoders that support the following file types: - BMPBMP - GIFGIF - JPEGJPEG - PNGPNG - TIFFTIFF 该文件将保持锁定状态，直到已释放。The file remains locked until the is disposed. 如果该文件没有有效的图像格式或如果[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]不支持像素格式的文件，此方法将引发异常。If the file does not have a valid image format or if [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] does not support the pixel format of the file, this method throws an exception. > [!NOTE] > 类在位图中不支持 alpha 透明度。The class does not support alpha transparency in bitmaps. 若要启用 alpha 透明度，且每个像素的 32 位使用 PNG 图像。To enable alpha transparency, use PNG images with 32 bits per pixel. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and methods. 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 若要运行此示例中，将其粘贴到窗体，并处理该窗体的通过调用的事件`DemonstratePropertyItem`方法，并传递`e`作为。To run this example, paste it into a form, and handle the form's event by calling the `DemonstratePropertyItem` method, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CPP/form1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CS/form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ImageExample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/VB/form1.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 托管 GDI + 具有内置编码器和解码器支持以下文件类型：Managed GDI+ has built-in encoders and decoders that support the following file types: - BMPBMP - GIFGIF - JPEGJPEG - PNGPNG - TIFFTIFF 如果该文件没有有效的图像格式或如果[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]不支持像素格式的文件，此方法将引发异常。If the file does not have a valid image format or if [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] does not support the pixel format of the file, this method throws an exception. 该文件将保持锁定状态，直到已释放。The file remains locked until the is disposed. `useEmbeddedColorManagement`参数指定是否新应用颜色校正根据嵌入图像文件中的颜色管理信息。The `useEmbeddedColorManagement` parameter specifies whether the new applies color correction according to color management information that is embedded in the image file. 国际色彩联合会 (ICC) 配置文件、 伽玛值和色度信息可以包括嵌入的信息。Embedded information can include International Color Consortium (ICC) profiles, gamma values, and chromaticity information. > [!NOTE] > 类在位图中不支持 alpha 透明度。The class does not support alpha transparency in bitmaps. 若要启用 alpha 透明度，且每个像素的 32 位使用 PNG 图像。To enable alpha transparency, use PNG images with 32 bits per pixel. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取新位图使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a new bitmap using the method. 它还演示了。It also demonstrates a . 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建包含名为的按钮的窗体`Button2`。Create a form containing a button named `Button2`. 将代码粘贴到窗体并将关联`Button2_Click`方法与该按钮事件。Paste the code into the form and associate the `Button2_Click` method with the button's event. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ImageExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你必须使流保持打开的生存期内。You must keep the stream open for the lifetime of the . 流是重置为零，如果用相同的流连续调用此方法。The stream is reset to zero if this method is called successively with the same stream. > [!NOTE] > 类在位图中不支持 alpha 透明度。The class does not support alpha transparency in bitmaps. 若要启用 alpha 透明度，且每个像素的 32 位使用 PNG 图像。To enable alpha transparency, use PNG images with 32 bits per pixel.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何加载从位图处理，使用枚举，以及如何使用方法，以便绘制的矩形边界的位图。The following code example demonstrates how to load a bitmap from an handle, using the enumeration, and how to use the method to draw the rectangle bounds of a bitmap. 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建包含名为的按钮的窗体`Button2`。Create a form that contains a button named `Button2`. 将代码粘贴到窗体并将此方法与按钮的关联事件。Paste the code into the form and associate this method with the button's event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回采取两种样式的多帧图像的相关信息： 多个页面和多个解决方法。This method returns information about multiple-frame images, which come in two styles: multiple page and multiple resolution. 多页映像是包含多个映像的映像。A multiple-page image is an image that contains more than one image. 每页包含单个映像 （或段）。Each page contains a single image (or frame). 连续生成动画的序列，如动态的.gif 文件通常显示这些页 （或映像或帧）。These pages (or images, or frames) are typically displayed in succession to produce an animated sequence, such as an animated .gif file. 多个高分辨率图像是映像的包含多个副本在不同的解决方法的映像。A multiple-resolution image is an image that contains more than one copy of an image at different resolutions. 这是通常由使用 MIP 映射其中显示的图像大小将确定用于绘制图像的分辨率。This is commonly used by MIP mapping where the displayed image size determines the resolution of the image used for drawing. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 可以支持任意数目的页 （或映像，或者帧），以及任意数量的解决方法。 can support an arbitrary number of pages (or images, or frames), as well as an arbitrary number of resolutions. 定义的维度为属性。The defined dimensions are properties of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果包含嵌入的缩略图图像，此方法检索嵌入式缩略图，可以扩展到所请求的大小。If the contains an embedded thumbnail image, this method retrieves the embedded thumbnail and scales it to the requested size. 如果不包含嵌入的缩略图图像，此方法通过缩放主映像来创建缩略图。If the does not contain an embedded thumbnail image, this method creates a thumbnail image by scaling the main image. 方法也适用的请求的缩略图时具有 120 x 120 像素为单位的大小。The method works well when the requested thumbnail image has a size of about 120 x 120 pixels. 如果从请求的大缩略图图像 (例如，300 x 300)具有嵌入式缩略图，可能有明显丢失的质量中的缩略图。If you request a large thumbnail image (for example, 300 x 300) from an that has an embedded thumbnail, there could be a noticeable loss of quality in the thumbnail image. 它可能是更好的做法 （而不是缩放嵌入式缩略图） 将主要图像缩放通过调用方法。It might be better to scale the main image (instead of scaling the embedded thumbnail) by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并显示缩略图。The following code example creates and displays a thumbnail image. 永远不会调用此委托。This delegate is never called. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造从文件、 新的位图使用和方法为图像重新着色。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a new bitmap from a file, using the and methods to recolor the image. 它还使用属性。It also uses the property. 此示例设计用于包含一个 Windows 窗体，和名为`Label1`， `PictureBox1`，和`Button1`分别。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a , and named `Label1`, `PictureBox1`, and `Button1`, respectively. 将代码粘贴到窗体并将关联`Button1_Click`方法与该按钮事件。Paste the code into the form and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's event. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ImageExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: An array of the property IDs, one for each property item stored in this image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该图像没有属性项或图像格式不支持属性项属性返回一个空数组 （即，长度为零的数组）。If the image has no property items or if the image format does not support property items, the property returns an empty array (that is, an array of length zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该图像没有属性项或图像格式不支持属性项返回一个空数组 （即，长度为零的数组）。If the image has no property items or if the image format does not support property items, returns an empty array (that is, an array of length zero). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何读取和显示在图像文件中使用的元数据类和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to read and display the metadata in an image file using the class and the property. 此示例旨在作为使用 Windows 窗体可导入命名空间。This example is designed to be used a Windows Form that imports the namespace. 将代码粘贴到窗体和更改的路径`fakePhoto.jpg`使其指向你的系统上图像文件。Paste the code into the form and change the path to `fakePhoto.jpg` to point to an image file on your system. 调用`ExtractMetaData`方法时处理该窗体的事件，并传递`e`作为。Call the `ExtractMetaData` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将轮换顺时针旋转的映像。The method rotates the image clockwise. 如果你想要在图像上绘制，已旋转后，你应始终检索新的图形对象从映像，否则，将出现异常。If you wish to draw on an image once it has been rotated, you should always retrieve a new graphics object from the image, otherwise an exception could occur. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法和枚举。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method on an and the enumeration. 此示例设计用于包含一个 Windows 窗体名为`PictureBox1`和名为的按钮`Button1`。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a named `PictureBox1` and a button named `Button1`. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，调用`InitializeBitmap`从窗体的构造函数，并将相关联`Button1_Click`与按钮的事件。Paste the code into a form, call `InitializeBitmap` from the form's constructor, and associate `Button1_Click` with the button's event. 确保你系统上有效的位图的文件路径。Ensure the file path to the bitmap is valid on your system. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.BitmapMembers#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.BitmapMembers/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果编码器不存在的映像的文件格式，则使用可移植网络图形 (PNG) 编码器。If no encoder exists for the file format of the image, the Portable Network Graphics (PNG) encoder is used. 当你使用方法将一幅图像保存为 Windows 图元文件格式 (WMF) 或增强型图元文件格式 (EMF) 文件中，生成的文件保存为可移植网络图形 (PNG) 文件。When you use the method to save a graphic image as a Windows Metafile Format (WMF) or Enhanced Metafile Format (EMF) file, the resulting file is saved as a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) file. 出现此行为是因为[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]组件的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]没有可用于将文件另存为.wmf 或.emf 文件的编码器。This behavior occurs because the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] component of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] does not have an encoder that you can use to save files as .wmf or .emf files. 将图像保存到同一个文件从构造不允许，并引发异常。Saving the image to the same file it was constructed from is not allowed and throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method. 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建包含名为的按钮的窗体`Button5`。Create a form that contains a button named `Button5`. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并将方法与按钮的事件。Paste the code into the form, and associate the method with the button's event. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ImageExample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/VB/form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应避免将图像保存到同一个流中用于构造。You should avoid saving an image to the same stream that was used to construct it. 这样可能会损坏流。Doing so might damage the stream. 必须将图像保存到流中的零偏移量。The image must be saved to the stream at an offset of zero. 如果在保存映像之前中任何其他数据已写入到流，将损坏流中的图像数据。If any additional data has been written to the stream before saving the image, the image data in the stream will be corrupted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不将图像保存到同一个用来构造该图像的流。Do not save an image to the same stream that was used to construct the image. 这样可能会损坏流。Doing so might damage the stream. 必须将图像保存到流中的零偏移量。The image must be saved to the stream at an offset of zero. 如果在保存映像之前中任何其他数据已写入到流，将损坏流中的图像数据。If any additional data has been written to the stream before saving the image, the image data in the stream will be corrupted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能值`dimensionID`参数是属性的。The possible values of the `dimensionID` parameter are properties of the . 可以使用这些来按其时间、 解决方法或页号标识图像。These can be used to identify an image by its time, resolution, or page number. 调用此方法会导致要放弃对上一个帧所做的所有更改。Calling this method causes all changes made to the previous frame to be discarded. 选择另一个帧之前, 保存到当前的框架，包括对像素值和属性的更改所做的所有更改。Before selecting another frame, save all changes made to the current frame, including changes to pixel values and properties. 如果调用方法就是成功 （没有发生的异常），该方法将返回 0。If the call to the method is successful (an exception does not occur), the method will return 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果图像格式不支持属性项，此方法将引发并显示消息"不支持此属性。"If the image format does not support property items, this method throws with the message "Property not supported." 如果图像格式支持属性项，但不支持您尝试设置的特定属性，此方法将忽略此尝试，但不会引发异常。If the image format supports property items but does not support the particular property you are attempting to set, this method ignores the attempt but does not throw an exception. 因为很难设置属性项类具有没有公共构造函数。It is difficult to set property items, because the class has no public constructors. 若要解决此限制的一种方法是获取通过检索属性值或调用方法已具有属性项。One way to work around this restriction is to obtain a by retrieving the property value or calling the method of an that already has property items. 然后，可以将设置的字段和将其传递到。Then you can set the fields of the and pass it to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and methods. 本示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 若要运行此示例中，将其粘贴到窗体，并处理该窗体的通过调用的事件`DemonstratePropertyItem`方法，并传递`e`作为。To run this example, paste it into a form, and handle the form's event by calling the `DemonstratePropertyItem` method, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造新从文件、 使用和方法为图像重新着色。The following code example demonstrates how to construct a new from a file, using the and methods to recolor the image. 它还使用， ，和属性。It also uses the , , and properties. 此示例设计用于包含 Windows 窗体，和名为`Label1`，`PictureBox1`和`Button1`分别。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Forms that contains a , and named `Label1`, `PictureBox1` and `Button1`, respectively. 将代码粘贴到窗体并将关联`Button1_Click`方法与该按钮事件。Paste the code into the form and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's event.
